explains: adj. 整修的；修剪整齐的
v. 修剪（manicure 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: manicure set 美甲套装；修指甲具

sentences.en: He was surprised to see how carefully she had manicured her broad hands.
sentences.cn: 他很惊讶，看到她那么仔细地护理她那双大手。

sentences.en: Manicured lawns and two-car garages are on every block.
sentences.cn: 每户都有修剪整齐的草坪和双车库。

sentences.en: Not far away, a few houses sit unscathed, with perfectly manicured gardens.
sentences.cn: 姨姨的房子的不远处，有几间房屋连同周围精心打理的花园幸免于难，保存完好。
